name: Digital Vision Solitario
description: DVS provides wide range of solutions on the top of WhatsApp Business API. DVS is an Intelligent WhatsApp Engagement Platform helping businesses broadcast messages, automate notifications and solve for customer support. Trusted by Enterprises, Growing Businesses and SMBs globally. Also, DVS helps service providers, media agencies, resellers and technology enablers with WhatsApp Business API based Solutions based on WhatsApp Cloud API
focus_areas: Whatsapp Engagement Platform : Helping Businesses with WhatsApp Broadcasting Automation, Live Chat & Chatbots
Develop Custome CRM and ERP System
